channel.title: Crowdfunding Collection #199, including every tabletop rpg project started between 07/17 and 07/31
channel.description: I present to you the new Crowdfunding Collection #199, including every tabletop rpg project started between 07/17 and 07/31. After things got back to normal I can present you the new Collection spanning just two weeks. Enjoy. item.title: Crowdfunding Collection #199, including every tabletop rpg project started between 07/17 and 07/31
item.dc:creator: @Teylen
item.description:
@Teylen wrote:

I present to you the new Crowdfunding Collection #199, including every tabletop rpg project started between 07/17 and 07/31.

After things got back to normal I can present you the new Collection spanning just two weeks. Enjoy.

English Crowdfundings

6 Roleplaying Games
4 Settings
2 D&D 5E Settings
3 Sourcebooks
8 D&D 5E Sourcebooks
4 Adventures
4 D&D 5E Adventures
8 Dice Projects
2 Accessoires
3 Boxes
2 Deck of Cards
4 Map Projects
1 Notebook
1 Podcast
2 Apps
1 Enamel Pin
2 Christmas Projects
3 Various RPG Projects

German Crowdfundings

2 Roleplaying Games

French Crowdfundings

1 Roleplaying Game

Article: https://teylen.blog/2022/07/31/crowdfunding-collection-199/
